summary: Completed testing of Telegram Delivery feature in Connections Module. Navigation structure is correctly implemented but authentication issues prevent full functionality testing.

integration_issues.issue: Authentication Required dialog appears even after successful login, preventing access to Telegram tab content
Frontend configured to use external URL (https://svetlana-connect-1j0v.preview.emergentagent.com) which is not accessible, causing 'Failed to fetch' errors

passed_tests: Telegram Delivery menu item is present in sidebar under Connections Module
Telegram Delivery has 'NEW' badge as expected
Admin navigation structure is correctly implemented
Backend API endpoints are working correctly (tested via curl)
Telegram settings API returns correct data structure

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints tested are working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Navigation structure works, but authentication and content access fails

critical_issues: Fix admin authentication flow - AdminAuthContext not properly maintaining authentication state
Resolve frontend-backend connectivity - external URL not accessible, need proper environment configuration
medium_issues: Verify AdminConnectionsPage authentication guards are working correctly
Test Telegram tab functionality once authentication is fixed
action_item_for_main_agent.notes: The Telegram Delivery feature implementation is structurally correct - menu item, navigation, and backend APIs are all working. The main issue is authentication flow preventing access to the actual content.
